channel.title: Slim on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Slim on Rusland 1

item.title: Centr 3x
item.description: Padarok Also from there: ‘Initially, they wrote an unofficial album Подарок (Podarok / Gift), but only 13 copies of it were made and given to their close friends for the New Year.’ Качели (katsjeli) means swing, and that’s also the title of their first album (released in 2007, more on Википедия = Wikipedia in Russian).

item.title: Slim – Recently
item.description: Chaos and Decay The diligently crafted fan clip provides a brief lesson in Russian recent history. Chaos and decay are central themes; in barely 3 minutes, more of that passes than can be explained here. Boris Yeltsin doesn’t come off well, but he does do a funny dance.
